subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Saying her surgically-repaired foot is swollen, Serena Williams withdrew from the Western & Southern Open, where No. 1 Caroline Wozniacki lost to a wild card.
snippet: Saying her surgically-repaired foot is swollen, Serena Williams withdrew from the Western & Southern Open, where No. 1 Caroline Wozniacki lost to a wild card.
